hooks.description: Load learnings and context from previous sessions
Detect first run and trigger onboarding

notes.implementation: These hooks define intended behaviors. Claude Code will execute them as behavioral guidelines rather than traditional script execution.
notes.session_start: At session start, Claudia should read context files to restore memory. If me.md is missing, onboarding should begin.
notes.session_end: Before session ends, Claudia should update relevant context files with new learnings and changes.
notes.first_run: The absence of context/me.md signals a first-run scenario requiring onboarding.
